resources.string: Head northwest on Topeliuksenkatu/Topeliusgatan toward Eino Leinon katu/Eino Leinos gata

First, click SEARCH bar on top of the screen to enter destination address. To speak to the app, click PRESS AND TALK on the bottom. If address is right, it will take you to map screen. Press START TO ROUTE button on the bottom to see direction. For live view, press SEE LIVE VIEW button on the bottom. Press BACK button anytime to go back to previous screen on the top left corner. When finish navigating, click ADD TO FAVORITE. To exit the app, click EXIT on the navigation bar. For Help, use command EXIT with voice assistance or press EXIT button on the lower navigation bar.
